byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka and Geeta Anand from Mumbai.
byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and GEETA ANAND

abstract: Supervisor at Zobeda Textile Mill in Bangladesh is arrested after 9-year-old worker Sagar Barman is found dead on floor; boy's father alleges managers at mill killed his son after child protested against abuse.
lead_paragraph: The father of Sagar Barman accused the supervisors at Zobeda Textile Mill in Dhaka of killing his son by pumping air into his rectum.

headline.main: 9-Year-Old Child Worker Dies in Bangladeshi Textile Mill
headline.print_headline: Supervisor Is Arrested After Boy, 9, Dies at Work

snippet: The father of Sagar Barman accused the supervisors at Zobeda Textile Mill in Dhaka of killing his son by pumping air into his rectum....
